short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to use GPT-4 in the chat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the Power of GPT-4 on Your Terms!

Tired of wondering if GPT-4 could improve your ChatGPT experience but hesitant to commit to a pricey monthly subscription? Say hello to our game-changing Chrome extension! With just one click, seamlessly integrate the enhanced capabilities of GPT-4 right into your ChatGPT sessions, without breaking the bank.

No more compromising on quality or being tied down by hefty subscription fees. Our pay-as-you-go model ensures you only pay for what you use, giving you the flexibility and control you deserve. Elevate your conversations and get superior results effortlessly, all within the familiar ChatGPT interface. Upgrade today and unleash the full potential of ChatGPT with GPT-4 at your fingertips!
